```{python env-variables}
import os

supabase_url = os.environ.get("SUPABASE_URL")
supabase_key = os.environ.get("SUPABASE_KEY")

ojs_define(supabase_url=supabase_url, supabase_key=supabase_key)

```

```{ojs requires}
ms = require('d3-milestones');
sb = require('@supabase/supabase-js');
```


```{ojs supabase_data}
supabase = sb.createClient(supabase_url, supabase_key);
data  = await supabase
  .from('timeline')
  .select();
```


```{ojs}
timelineArray = [];
{
  for (let year = 2020; year <= 2025; year++) {
    timelineArray.push({ first_run: `${year}-01-01`, task: ''});
  } 
}

combined =data.data.concat(timelineArray);
```


```{ojs timeline}

timeline = ms('#timeline')
	.mapping({
		'timestamp': 'first_run',
		'text': 'task'
	})
  .optimize(true)
	.parseTime('%Y-%m-%d')
	.aggregateBy('month')
	.render(combined);
```
